classification.intended_installation_point: Main service entrance / primary distribution panel
classification.electrical_environment: Very high fault-current commercial and industrial WYE systems

overview.positioning_headline: Extreme-duty two-stage primary surge protection for large WYE services
marketing_paragraphs: From the main service entrance, the Mach 5 SPD System isolates sensitive downstream equipment from severe utility disturbances, lightning-induced surges, and internally generated electrical transients.

The system also isolates downstream distribution panels from internally generated surges, establishing a complete and coordinated grid of non-degrading surge protection across the electrical infrastructure.
Mach 5 products are designed for mission-critical facilities where very high surge exposure, large electrical capacities, and long-term system reliability are essential.
overview.technical_positioning: The SurgePure Mach 5 SPD System is a primary level, two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protective device utilizing non-degrading Single Element (SE*) technology and engineered for very large WYE electrical services.

bulleted_features: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts
Two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protection architecture for extreme energy dissipation
Unique Dual-Mode fuse-links maintain safety of very high-energy, non-degrading surge capacity
Designed for close-coupled installation delivering fast response-time protection
Up to one million amps of solid, safe, single-element parallel surge protection
Surge Cushion technology reduces electrical noise, harmonics, and power pollution

safety_claims: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2
TVSS industry’s highest SCCR rating of 200kAIC

status_indicators.description: Lifetime green LED self-test protection status monitors for each phase

optional_features.name: Remote Aware
optional_features.description: Automatic remote alert when surge protection status changes
